topic: AI tools for automating creative prompt generation
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that by shuffling my own prompts and incorporating diverse perspectives, I can generate more innovative and unexpected ideas. As a next step, I will organize a collaborative brainstorming session with a group of individuals from varied backgrounds. Additionally, I'll explore using AI tools to automate the shuffling process and evaluate the effectiveness of the newly generated prompts.

metadata.trigger: If I shuffled my own prompts, what new ones emerge?
